id.about: A comma separated list of Tweet IDs, up to 100 are allowed in a single request.

count.about: Specifies the number of records to retrieve. Must be less than or equal to 100.

trim_user.about: When set to either true , t or 1 , each Tweet returned in a timeline will include a user object including only the status authors numerical ID. Omit this parameter to receive the complete user object.
